Package gov.nasa.worldwindx.examples.view

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddAnimator
    This example demonstrates the use of BasicFlyView with a FlyToFlyViewAnimator, allowing the user to fly smoothly to new locations by simply specifying a location's name or lat-long coordinates.
    AddAnimator.AppFrame  
    ViewSwitch
    This example demonstrates the difference between BasicOrbitView and BasicFlyView by allowing the user to select the preferred view type and then enter the name or lat-lon coordinates of a new location to move the view to.
    ViewSwitch.AppFrame
